articles.title: Brazil's Braskem to take 2.7 bln reais charge for mining project
articles.description: Brazil petrochemical producer Braskem SA has agreed a 2.7 billion reais ($667 million) deal with federal and state authorities in the northeastern state of Alagoas to cover damage caused by a mining project in the area.
articles.content:
BRASILIA, Jan 3 (Reuters) - Brazil petrochemical producer Braskem SA has agreed a 2.7 billion reais ($667 million) deal with federal and state authorities in the northeastern state of Alagoas to cover damage caused by a mining project in the area.

articles.title: Via discreet airport lounge, Ghosn oligarchminded mystery escape from Japan
articles.description: Despite being one of the world's most-recognisable executives, former Nissan chairman Carlos Ghosn probably embarked onto a private jet from a quiet lounge in Japan's third-largest airport on his astonishing escape from a fraud trial.
articles.content: OSAKA, Japan (Reuters) - Despite being one of the world’s most-recognizable executives, former Nissan chairman Carlos Ghosn probably embarked onto a private jet from a quiet lounge in Japan’s third-largest airport on his astonishing escape from a fraud trial.… [+2791 chars]

articles.title: Indonesia boosts patrols after Chinese boat 'trespasses' in its waters
articles.description: Indonesia has increased patrols around islands near the disputed South China Sea after a Chinese coast guard vessel "trespassed" into Indonesia's exclusive economic zone, authorities said on Friday.
articles.content:
JAKARTA (Reuters) - Indonesia has increased patrols around islands near the disputed South China Sea after a Chinese coast guard vessel “trespassed” into Indonesia’s exclusive economic zone, authorities said on Friday.

articles.title: Democrat Klobuchar's presidential campaign raised $11.4 million in fourth quarter
articles.description: U.S. Senator Amy Klobuchar, who is running for the Democratic nomination for president, raised $11.4 million in the fourth quarter of 2019, more than doubling the previous quarter's amount, according to a statement from her campaign.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. Senator Amy Klobuchar, who is running for the Democratic nomination for president, raised $11.4 million in the fourth quarter of 2019, more than doubling the previous quarter’s amount, according to a statement from her campaign.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Indian banks' loans rise 7.1% in two weeks to December 20
articles.description: Indian banks' loans rose 7.1% in the two weeks to Dec. 20 from a year ago, while deposits rose 10.1%, the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) weekly statistical supplement showed on Friday.
articles.content:
BENGALURU (Reuters) - Indian banks’ loans rose 7.1% in the two weeks to Dec. 20 from a year ago, while deposits rose 10.1%, the Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) weekly statistical supplement showed on Friday.
